markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Loud Singer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1426) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Goblin Song](/Feats.aspx?ID=42)

</column>

---

Staying on pitch, proper breath control, and remembering the words are all less important than the real measure of a good singer: volume! The range of your [Goblin Song](/Feats.aspx?ID=42) is increased to 60 feet, and you can target one additional enemy when you use it.
name: Loud Singer
